title: Did not receive a response from server ???
body:
Everytime I try and connect I get the message 'Did not receive a response from server; retrying' 
Tried a few different solutions I've found but no luck with them.. My friend is able to play on the same wifi connection so I'm assuming it is something wrong with my computer. Not sure if I'm just missing something or what but thanks for any help :)

replies.body: Thought I'd give an update saying that I fixed my issue by uninstalling my Antivirus, (AVG2013) Thanks Horse for your help :)

oh

PFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFFT

That stuff is usually covered in the error message itself, like, League actually tells you that it has been blocked by a firewall. Strange that you were able to open up the client, inclusive of updates and patches, but not able to log in.

I'll keep that in mind. Were you able to reinstall AVG and log in?
Yeah re-installed the newest version and working fine so far :)

Always a good idea to keep programs like that updated.

Also I notice that you've changed region. Hope it wasn't because of this mess~

So i have changed my DNS settings to googles, checked my ports, messed around in the IE settings, synced my clock, repaired, re-installed and still no luck :( No one has anymore ideas of what i should try?

That's exactly what I would have suggested.

Have you done a [netalyzer test](http://netalyzr.icsi.berkeley.edu)? It could be a specific way something complicated is configured which is preventing you from doing so. Don't post the entire results here, but do note any summary notification that appears in red.

I hadn't run it before. Just ran it then and didn't receive any red notifications but got 2 yellow ones regarding network packet buffering possibly being excessive and my uplink having estimated 500ms of buffering. Not sure if either of these are relevant to my situation?

I don't think so. That's close to what I got when I ran the test out of curiousity, but my League is working fine.

Were you ever able to connect and log in at any point or has this always been an issue?

I have been able to in the past, but that was over a year ago.. only just redownloaded it a couple of days ago and haven't been able to log in since that.. Pretty lost atm, feels like i've tried everything ! :P
